thread.title: PREVIEW: Colin Towns Mask Orchestra, Turner Sims, Southampton
thread.title_full: PREVIEW: Colin Towns Mask Orchestra, Turner Sims, Southampton

title: PREVIEW: Colin Towns Mask Orchestra, Turner Sims, Southampton
text:
0 comments 
WHEN Colin Towns formed the Mask Orchestra in 1990, he brought together some of the most important new and established players on the jazz scene. The Mask Orchestra was seen not only as an exciting new band, it was ground breaking. Twenty-five years on, Colin Towns Mask Orchestra is back. The new double album Drama will be the group's seventh release and boasts a line-up featuring a veritable who’s who of jazz’s finest, alongside handpicked players of the new generation. Share article 
The band will also perform three very special live shows - including one at Turner Sims in Southampton a week today- their first live shows since the Orpheus Suite with the Birmingham Royal Ballet in 2010. 
Call 023 8059 5151 or see turnersims.co.uk Promoted Stories PREVIEW: Colin Towns Mask Orchestra, Turner Sims, Southampton
